TEXT.TITLE: WINTERHALTER <WNTLC> HOLDERS OKAY TAKEOVER
TEXT.BODY: Winterhalter Inc said its shareholders approved the 525,000 dlr acquisition of Winterhalter by Interface Systems Inc <INTF>. The acquisition would be for 15 cts per Winterhalter share. Reuter
